key_risks: Interest rate sensitivity impacting borrowing costs and loan portfolio value
Exposure to commercial real estate market risks, including declining property values and tenant defaults
Dependence on capital markets for funding, increasing vulnerability to credit tightening
External management structure raising potential conflicts of interest
Regulatory and tax risks affecting operations and profitability
controversies: Rising short interest (3.68% of shares) reflecting investor skepticism
Board resignation of Gregory White introducing governance uncertainty
governance_issues: External management by TPG RE Finance Trust Management, L.P. creating potential conflicts of interest
Governance uncertainty following Gregory White's resignation
